title: Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR)
description: The application allows unauthorized access to sensitive data by directly referencing objects.
fix: Implement proper authorization checks before accessing any object. Use a mapping system that maps user roles and permissions to the actual objects they are allowed to access.

reasoning.pattern: Directly referencing objects without proper authorization checks. This can lead to unauthorized data access or manipulation.
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by directly referencing objects that they are not supposed to access.
